welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lindsay, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our small but vibrant city, known for its beautiful lakes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lindsay has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peterborough Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Peterborough Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Oshawa Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
